sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Container, Typography, Box, Button, Grid, Paper } from "@mui/material";
import { Link } from "react-router-dom";



// Fade-in animation
const fadeIn = keyframes`
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); }
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
`;

const Home = () => {
  return (
    <Box
      sx={{
        minHeight: '100vh',
        backgroundImage: 'url(/Landora.png)',
        backgroundSize: 'cover',
        backgroundPosition: 'center',
        backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat',
        display: 'flex',
        flexDirection: 'column',
      }}
    >
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Container
        maxWidth="sm"
        sx={{
          background: 'rgba(255,255,255,0.85)',
          borderRadius: 3,
          py: 6,
          mt: 10,
          animation: `${fadeIn} 1s ease-in`,
        }}
      >
        <Box textAlign="center">
          <Typography variant="h3" gutterBottom sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold' }}>
            Welcome to Landora üè°
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h6" paragraph>
            Your trusted platform for managing and exploring properties.
          </Typography>
          <Button
            variant="contained"
            color="primary"
            component={Link}
            to="/properties"
            sx={{ mt: 2, px: 4 }}
          >
            View Properties
          </Button>
        </Box>
      </Container>

      {/* Features Section */}
      <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ mt: 10, mb: 10 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" align="center" gutterBottom sx={{ fontWeight: 'bold', mb: 5 }}>
          Why Choose Landora?
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Paper
              elevation={3}
              sx={{
                p: 4,
                textAlign: 'center',
                borderRadius: 3,
                transition: 'transform 0.3s',
                '&:hover': { transform: 'translateY(-10px)' },
              }}
            >
              <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
                Easy Management
              </Typography>
              <Typography>
                Manage all your properties in one place with simple and intuitive tools.
              </Typography>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Paper
              elevation={3}
              sx={{
                p: 4,
                textAlign: 'center',
                borderRadius: 3,
                transition: 'transform 0.3s',
                '&:hover': { transform: 'translateY(-10px)' },
              }}
            >
              <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
                Explore Properties
              </Typography>
              <Typography>
                Browse available properties with detailed descriptions, images, and locations.
              </Typography>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Paper
              elevation={3}
              sx={{
                p: 4,
                textAlign: 'center',
                borderRadius: 3,
                transition: 'transform 0.3s',
                '&:hover': { transform: 'translateY(-10px)' },
              }}
            >
              <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
                Secure & Reliable
              </Typography>
              <Typography>
                Trust our platform to keep your property information safe and always accessible.
              </Typography>
            </Paper>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Container>

      {/* Call to Action Section */}
      <Box
        sx={{
          py: 8,
          backgroundColor: 'rgba(0,0,0,0.6)',
          color: 'white',
          textAlign: 'center',
          animation: `${fadeIn} 2s ease-in`,
        }}
      >
        <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
          Ready to get started?
        </Typography>
        <Button
          variant="contained"
          color="secondary"
          component={Link}
          to="/properties"
          sx={{ mt: 3, px: 5 }}
        >
          Explore Now
        </Button>
      </Box>

    </Box>
  );
};

export default Home;
